msg: This commit was manufactured by cvs2svn to create tag

author: mturk
msg: Simple patch that allows setting quasi-environment variables that
will be resolved later in the config.
If the option name starts with $ like $TOMCAT_HOME=/some/path
then that will be set to the cfg->map and resolved later in the config.
Keeps the config smaller and requires no reboot.

author: hgomez
msg: May be Glenn should take a look if I didn't introduce problems here...
